modName: Legendary smithing perk - dragonbone weapon fix
summary: Fixes the problem with legendary smithing perk involving tempering dragonbone weapons.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD - Although there\\\'d be no reason to use this mod if you don\\\'t have Dawnguard...

In the legendary smithing perk mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1690 dragonbone weapons do not benefit from the dragon smithing perk when you play Dawnguard. Although you can fix this by disabling the mod, loading, tempering the weapon and enabling mod again, I believe this to be a far simpler solution.

This will change the description of dragon smithing to include weapons, and of course allow dragonbone weapons to benefit from the dragon smithing perk.

There should be no problems, just make sure to have this load AFTER legendary smithing perks. Shouldn\\\'t conflict with other smithing mods unless they change dragon smithing in some way.

If there is a problem, please let me know.
author: Deathslayr
